basics.name: Samuel Abebayehu Abebe
basics.summary: As a skilled professional, I am a dedicated software developer and team leader with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and a strong background. I have a proven track record of leading teams, designing integration architectures, and developing tools and pipelines. My experience includes significant roles at Ethiopian Airlines, Tech Mahindra, and ICAP International.

work.summary: Lead a team responsible for managing our CRM platform - Implementation of CRM service module, integration of external services and replicating siloed systems into one CRM platform.
highlights: Participate in new implementation requests where Integration needs, feature addition or new service implementations are presented
Bench marking and proposing new ideas and implementation for better experience
Training and guiding team members
Architecture design for third party integration and internal platform implementations
Performance follow up and reporting

work.summary: Developing use cases using Java client libraries, preparing processes on process manager, and deploying artifacts in a Zookeeper managed environment.
highlights: Data ingestion pipeline preparation - Extraction services, transformation mechanisms and transfer architectures
Perform Migration of existing code base and modules to newer API's releases or platform upgrade on IX
Setting up real-time targeted data extraction per business requirement - notifying customers, showing real-time departure and arrival data etc...
Managing, preparing and visualizing revenue, performance etc... data on SAP BI platform
Preparation of Power BI reports for internal consumption and AD hoc requests

work.summary: Perform Integrated Systems monitoring and application log analysis.
highlights: Perform Integrated Systems monitoring - monitoring - Splunk, ELK, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Grafana
Application log analysis, insights and reporting
Incident management on BMC Helix
Regular system health check for processes, services and endpoints
Weekly application performance measuring, reporting and suggestion on improvements
Improvement - Error rate classification and improvement plan preparation
RCCA - Recurring incident follow up and resolution

work.summary: Develop tools and customization for Open MRS implementation to Ethiopian health facilities and development of reporting pipelines using MambaETL module.
highlights: Develop and optimize integrations between OpenMRS and external systems
Develop OpenMRS modules based on requirements
Support with deployment plans and tooling
Working with health sector organizations regarding training

projects.name: CRM Implementation
projects.description: ETHIOPIAN HAS ACQUIRED A CRM PLATFORM CONSISTING OF TIGHTLY COUPLED SALES, SERVICE AND MARKETING SERVICES. I WAS TASKED WITH DESIGN AND DELIVERY OF DATA AND TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION SUPPORT FOR OUR INTERNAL CUSTOMERS AND ORACLE IMPLEMENTATION TEAM.
highlights: Facilitated setup of streaming integration data with identification and structuring data and delivering same to Oracle endpoint.
Participated on initial adoption of this services assisting our internal teams.

projects.name: Loyalty and reservation system integration
projects.description: Implemented a solution to enable agents to validate and purchase miles without leaving the reservation system, which previously required opening two services from two vendors.
highlights: Created an analyzer to detect specific parameters and trigger a SOAP Web Service request to our loyalty service and update the outcome on source system.

projects.name: Mamba Reporting implementation
projects.description: Performed implementation of MambaETL and a warehousing solution, with added reporting modules developed based on PEPFAR requirements.
highlights: The tool was packaged with Ethiopian OpenMRS implementation and self-contained, deployed at facilities level throughout Ethiopia.
